title: Club Tag still Go e
body:
So when the club tags went down we were told to wait and they'd be up again. They're up again, but now I'm not even in my own club. My friends say it still shows me as the owner of it too. 

Do I keep waiting or is there something that can be done.

replies.body: There was a club [outage ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)that caused some issues by preventing club owners from seeing their clubs.  These issues should now be solved, so we'll want to take a closer look at your specific issue if you're experiencing this.   Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can review this with you individually.  We'll get back to you asap!
